titleStmt.title: A Godlie treatisse declaryng the benefites, fruites, and great commodities of prayer and also the true vse therof. Written in Latin, fourtie yeres past, by an Englyshe man, of great vertue [and] learnyng. And lately translated into Englyshe. 1560.
Tractatus de orando Deum. English
titleStmt.author: Fisher, John, Saint, 1469-1535.
